publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1345.2 Tommy Sheridan: Social Justice-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1345) in the name of Jackie Baillie, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "believes that far too little progress has been made across Scotland in delivering social justice and greater equality and that redistributive taxation linked to the redistribution of wealth is essential to deliver social justice and greater equality for all Scots.
